summary: New Hairs for your character with accesories
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/768379RTShairpackbanner.jpg[/img][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] [/center][center] [/center]
[center][color=#008080][size=4][b]Description[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][/center]- Add 18 new female hair into skyrim, many of them are very unique looking, because of the accessories in them.
- Accessories will keep their original color when you switch hair color.
- Hairs are available for every vanilla races and custom races.
- Hairs are optimized for skinny body, some of them will clip with bigger breasts.

[center][youtube]u3FgQRMlQSA[/youtube][/center]
[center] [/center][center] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][color=#008080][size=4][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center]Use Nexus mod manager or manual install, very simple.[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center]Next share your pictures :)



[color=#008080][size=3][b][size=4]In motion[/size]

[youtube]WmXjSGVwxck[/youtube][/b][/size][/color][youtube]RqA22QZtWfo[/youtube][youtube]pffQQjKTDaA[/youtube]
[color=#38761D][b]


[color=#ff7700][size=3]For modders:[/size][/color][/b][/color][/center][center]There is an esm version of this mod as misc file, if you want to insert thoses hair in your mod.[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] [/center]
